--- author: Michael Nikitochkin title: First Foreign Certificate date: 27/11/2012 I have received the first certificate from a foreign college. The course counted on beginners and in my opinion it is the school level, but anyway it is my first easy gotten [certificate](http://f.cl.ly/items/1d2F0Q1y2z1c0B042w3L/Python%20certificate%20112012.pdf).
